# API Tester VS Code Extension

This VS Code extension provides an API testing interface with:
- Explorer Panel: Tree view showing folders and files
- Explorer Toolbar: Add folder/file buttons
- Folder Edit Panel: Edit folder name and base-url
- File Edit Panel: Edit file name, URL, and content
- Data Storage: Persistent storage for folder/file information

## Development
This extension is built using TypeScript and the VS Code Extension API.

##  Short summaries
Only give short summaries of actions taken, unless the user is asking for a pln in which case give a full answer
